articles.title: PRESS DIGEST-British Business - July 8
articles.content: July 8 - The following are the top stories onthe business pages of British newspapers. Reuters has notverified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy. ...

articles.title: Meta lures Apple’s top AI executive in latest talent coup, Bloomberg reports
articles.content: Investing.com -- Apple Inc (NASDAQ:AAPL). has lost a key figure in its artificial intelligence efforts to Meta Platforms Inc (NASDAQ:META)., as the battle for elite AI talent intensifies. Ruoming Pang, a distinguished engineer who led Apple’s foundation models team, is leaving to join Meta, according to a report from Bloomberg citing people familiar with the matter.

articles.title: Alert on apple's q3 revenue was erroneous and has been withdrawn
articles.content: The alert on Apple Inc's third-quarter revenue is wrong and has been withdrawn. It was published inadvertently from a press release issued by shareholder rights law firm Bragar Eagel & Squire, P.C,...

articles.title: Stocks to Watch Recap: Tesla, Apple, Uber
articles.content: ↘️ Tesla (TSLA): Chief Executive Elon Musk said Saturday he had created a new political party, after reigniting a feud with President Trump. The president said Musk's America Party was "ridiculous." Tesla shares slid 6.

articles.title: Nvidia Stock Dips. Why Shares Are Dropping—and How Close They Are to a Market Cap Record.
articles.content: Shares were sliding as part of a broader selloff, with investors on edge ahead of the July 9 deadline for U.S. tariff deals.
